SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

eu.ist.astra.am.model
Class ApplicationManagerModel

java.lang.Object
  eu.ist.astra.am.model.ApplicationManagerModel

public class ApplicationManagerModel
extends java.lang.Object

It implements the model part of the application following the MVC architectural pattern (Adapted to SWING based on the article: http://www.developer.com/design/article.php/3678856) Remote exceptions are thrown to be threaten in the controller where the necessary measures are taken.

Author:
David Rozas

savePublicTag

public boolean savePublicTag(java.lang.String tag,
                             java.lang.String appId)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
It communicates with the remote bundle TagManagerBackEnd to store the public tag typed by the user

Parameters:
tag - Tag to be stored
appId - Application identifier whose tag is going to be associated
Returns:
True if the operation was performed sucessfully, false otherwise (not valid tag or duplicated tag)
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
